remarks: This is a version of ~ sbco2 where ` z ` is distinct from ` y ` .  It is a lemma on the way to proving ~ sbco2 which has no distinct variable constraints.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 19-Mar-2018.)
statement:
sbco2yz.1 $e |- F/ z ph $.
sbco2yz $p |- ( [ y / z ] [ z / x ] ph <-> [ y / x ] ph ) $.
$d y z $.
